overview:
Sonja brings a diverse array of talent and entrepreneurial experience to the CollectiveX management team. In addition to her killer Photoshop skills, Sonja’s marketing experience and relationships help fuel CollectiveX’s enterprise sales efforts.

Prior to joining the CollectiveX team, Sonja was founder and Creative Director at Shock Theory Interactive where she served clients including: The Grammys, Lincoln Mercury, Ford Motor Company, The City of Atlanta, and many others. Sonja also co-founded Mobloco.com, a mobile enabled social community now mKonnect, AllStarWeek.com, an online event website dedicated to providing event information surrounding the NBA All-Star annually and host of other social media applications. .
